itemDisplayName: HDInsight with custom Ambari + Hive Metastore DB in VNET
description: This template allows you to create an HDInsight cluster in an existing virtual network with a new SQL DB that serves as both a custom Ambari DB and Hive Metastore. You must have an existing SQL Sever, storage account, and VNET.
summary: Creates an HDInsight cluster in an existing virtual network with a new SQL DB for Ambari+Hive Metastore. You must have an existing SQL Sever, storage account, and VNET.
